}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel Atom]]'' Quad-Core (@2.4GHz) x86-64 *Memory: 6GB DDR3 (DIMM) RAM *Storage: 8MB CMOS Serial Flash, :64GB Transcend SSD *Network: 8x Gigabit Ethernet ports *WiFi: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880 (802.11abgn/ac) *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 3.33A via barrel
